articles.author: Simon Sharwood
articles.title: Square Kilometre Array prototype 'scope achieves first light - The Register
articles.description: SKAMPI was made in China, driven by Docker, located in South Africa, and aimed at the stars
articles.content:
Reg In Space One of the radio telescope designs to be used by the Square Kilometre Array has achieved first light.
Known as SKAMPI, the 'scope was designed by a team whose members hailed from ten na… [+2664 chars]
